name: Bryce Anders
detailed_location: Vault 3Convince Anders to head back:Camp McCarran

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: It's better not to do a lot of talking on assassination missions.

topics.topic_text: What was the name of the Fiend who was carrying keys?
topics.response_text: Daniel. Probably find him back in the Residential Wing somewhere.

topics.topic_text: Let me take another look at that leg.
topics.response_text: How's it look, doc?

topics.topic_text: VMS07Greeting
topics.response_text: Thanks for the assistance taking out Motor-Runner. I'll be heading back to McCarran. I'll put in a good word for you.

topics.topic_text: I was sent here by Colonel Hsu.
topics.response_text: Hsu sent you? This was my mission!{"Shoe"}

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about this place?
topics.response_text: What are you looking to find out?

topics.topic_text: Never mind, I'm leaving now.
topics.response_text: Make yourself scarce. If you get yourself in trouble, I'm not going to cover your back.

topics.topic_text: What am I doing here? What are you doing here?
topics.response_text: Why I'm here is my business. If you don't have a question for me then get lost.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about what happened here?
topics.response_text: The Fiends killed everyone living here, and now they are squatting in their home.

topics.topic_text: What is this place?
topics.response_text: This was Vault 3, but I'm sure you can tell that by all the 3s all over the damn place. Now it is a drug den for the goddamn Fiends.

topics.topic_text: Who are the Fiends?
topics.response_text: The Fiends are degenerate drug addicts who kill and rape for fun, basically. They're human garbage - though I'm not sure about the human part.

topics.topic_text: The Colonel was concerned. You missed your check-in.
topics.response_text: You can go back to old Hsu and tell him that the mission will be completed. I just need a couple more days.{"Shoe"}

topics.topic_text: Colonel Hsu thinks you need additional support.
topics.response_text: Is that right? And what sort of support, exactly, is it that you have to offer?

topics.topic_text: I'm sure you can handle it alone. I'll leave you to it.
topics.response_text: Good idea. Try not to get hurt out there.

topics.topic_text: I want to help you rescue the hostages.
topics.response_text: Yeah? Nice thought, but that's not my primary mission. If you want to go it solo, more power to you.

topics.topic: VMS07V03BryceAndersTopic011SPEECH attempt to convince Bryce to help take out Motor-Runner
topics.topic_text: The only way you're going to take out Motor-Runner is if we work together.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I guess you're right. I won't be able to move fast, but I can more than hold my own in a firefight. Here, take the key...

topics.topic_text: Let me take out Motor-Runner for you.
topics.response_text: Bad idea on all sorts of levels. Leave it to the professionals, kid.

topics.topic_text: What's the hold-up - if you don't mind my asking?
topics.response_text: What's it look like? I caught one in the leg. I killed a dozen of those degenerates sneaking my way in... but one got a drop on me.{hates admitting it}

topics.topic_text: I'm afraid your leg looks - and smells - like it's on the verge of infection.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Goddammit. I know. Was just hoping that, uh...

topics.topic_text: If you head for McCarran now, I think you'll make it in time - even at a limp.
topics.response_text: Goddammit. Fine. I'll head back. Are you saying you'll handle Motor-Runner yourself?

topics.topic_text: I have a doctor's bag right here. It should be enough to get you on your feet.
topics.response_text: What are we waiting for? I've got a high-value target to kill!

topics.topic_text: I'll check in with you and Colonel Hsu when it's done.
topics.response_text: All right. Let me give you the key to the Maintenance Wing...

topics.topic_text: I don't have a spare doctor's bag I can spare.
topics.response_text: Yeah? Well, there's a ton of pharmaceuticals out there. Maybe you can find one and bring it back to me. It'd be a great help...

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Okay, but make it quick.

topics.topic_text: Tell me what an NCR ranger is doing here.
topics.response_text: Tell me why I should tell you anything. I don't know you.

topics.topic_text: <Lie>I'm an independent contractor with the NCR.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, my apologies sir. I was sent here by Colonel Hsu to exterminate Motor-Runner, the leader of the Fiends.

topics.topic_text: I just have a couple questions.
topics.response_text: Okay, what do you need?

topics.topic_text: I just have a couple questions.
topics.response_text: Okay, what do you need?

topics.topic_text: I didn't come here to do your job for you.
topics.response_text: Well, take this goddamn key anyways. It'll get you into the Maintenance Wing. Maybe you'll brave up and do the right thing. Good luck.

topics.topic_text: I could use your help taking care of Motor-Runner.
topics.response_text: Okay, I'll follow you down to Motor-Runner. Here, take the key to the maintenance wing.

topics.topic_text: I could use your help taking care of Motor-Runner.
topics.response_text: Okay, I'll follow you down to Motor-Runner. Here, take the key to the maintenance wing.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I think your leg's in good enough shape. You're all set.
topics.response_text: Really? It doesn't feel any better... but I'll take your word on it. Motor-Runner, here I come.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I think you are healthy enough to take care of Motor-Runner yourself.
topics.response_text: Really? I didn't think my leg was up to full speed yet, but I'll take your word on it.

topics.topic_text: Just making sure you're okay. I'll be back.
topics.response_text: Thanks for the concern, doc.

topics.topic_text: Not right now, just making sure you are ok. I'll be back later.
topics.response_text: Okay, thanks again for the medical care doc.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the Fiends?
topics.response_text: They're a bunch of degenerate, drug-addicted killers and rapists who've turned the west side of Vegas into a war zone.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about the Fiends?
topics.response_text: The Fiends are a bunch of raider junkie fucks who have been causing a lot of trouble in the area outside of Vegas.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Vault 3?
topics.response_text: The inhabitants of the Vault were simple traders. They made a good living for themselves before they were all killed by the fiends.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Vault 3?
topics.response_text: The inhabitants of the Vault were simple traders. They made a good living for themselves for a couple weeks.

topics.topic_text: What was your mission again?
topics.response_text: I was sent here to kill Motor-Runner, the leader of the Fiends.

topics.topic_text: What was your mission again?
topics.response_text: I was sent here to kill Motor-Runner, the leader of the Fiends.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Like what?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Okay, tell me what's on your mind.

topics.topic_text: I'm not sure how much I can help. But I have another question.
topics.response_text: Your talking slows my healing process. Be snappy about it.

topics.topic_text: Come on. It's time for us to go take care of Motor-Runner.
topics.response_text: Roger that shit. Let's go.

topics.topic_text: Follow me, let's go take care of Motor-Runner.
topics.response_text: Okay, let's get him.

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: Okay, I'll wait.

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: Okay, I'll wait.

topics.topic_text: I can handle myself pretty well. I found you didn't I?
topics.response_text: I guess you probably can. You look tough enough at least. I'm not sure how long it'll take this leg to heal up.

topics.topic: VMS07V03BryceAndersTopic037DUPLICATE000SPEECH attempt for Bryce to let you take out Motor Runner
topics.topic_text: I can handle myself just fine. I found you, didn't I?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I guess you have a point. And I don't know how long it'll be before I'm on both feet...

topics.topic_text: Let me ask you something else.
topics.response_text: Do you ever quit? Go on.

topics.topic_text: Alright, I don't want to cause you any trouble.
topics.response_text: See that you don't.

topics.topic_text: All right, fine. I don't want to cause you any trouble.
topics.response_text: First sensible thing I've heard you say.

topics.topic_text: I have another couple of questions for you.
topics.response_text: Be quick about it.

topics.topic_text: Let me ask you some questions.
topics.response_text: Be quick about it.

conversation.response_text: Make yourself scarce. If you get yourself in trouble, I'm not going to cover your back.
What the hell do you want?

description:
Bryce Anders is a 28 year-old Hispanic Male.

A dedicated New California Republic Ranger stationed at Camp McCarran in the Mojave Wasteland. Bryce is known for his tactical prowess and commitment to NCR values. In early October 2281, he was assigned a critical mission to infiltrate Vault 3 and eliminate Motor-Runner, the leader of the Fiends who were constantly harassing NCR troops in the South Vegas ruins.

Bryce Anders's Personality: Disciplined, courageous, and pragmatic. Bryce approaches every situation with tactical precision, often prioritizing mission success over personal comfort. He maintains a professional demeanor but shows genuine concern for fellow Rangers and the NCR's mission to bring stability to the Mojave.

Bryce Anders's Backstory: Born and raised in one of the NCR's territories, Bryce was drawn to the Rangers' ideals of protecting the innocent and maintaining order. After completing his training, he was stationed at Camp McCarran, where he quickly proved himself as a capable operative. Bryce has been involved in multiple operations against raider gangs and other threats to NCR interests in the Mojave. His reputation for reliability and skill led to his assignment to the high-stakes mission into Vault 3.
